LanguageData.Setting_CMC: Setting[Most of them don't require a restart of the game to take effect]
LanguageData.Setting1_CMC: Non-player characters are in possession of CeleTech heavy weapons
LanguageData.Setting3_CMC: Non-player characters are in possession of CeleTech conventional light weapons
LanguageData.Setting8_CMC: Weapon cooldown piercing multiplier[The game needs to be restarted]
LanguageData.Setting8_1_CMC: Weapon cooldown piercing[The game needs to be restarted]
LanguageData.Setting_D1_CMC: Non-player characters are in possession of CeleTech heavy weapons
LanguageData.Setting_D3_CMC: Non-player characters are in possession of CeleTech conventional light weapons
